title: Big Problems (Kodak Black Interview )
itunes:title: Big Problems (Kodak Black Interview )
description:
Today on the show we had Kodak Black zoom in where he spoke about recently getting shot, his new album and his recent comments on working with woman in the industry. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a 14 year old girl who used a website to put a hit out on her ex boyfriend. Also, Angela helped some listeners our during "Ask Yee" with one listener have a "large" problem.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Kodak Black zoom in where he spoke about recently getting shot, his new album and his recent comments on working with woman in the industry. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a 14 year old girl who used a website to put a hit out on her ex boyfriend. Also, Angela helped some listeners our during "Ask Yee" with one listener have a "large" problem.
